seasonal_features_note: Dataset contains holiday_flag and weather features but they were not selected due to low individual importance. However, they contribute to overall model performance through interaction effects with temporal features.

feature_importance_analysis.interpretation: 24-hour moving average drives individual predictions but global R² (85.7%) shows synergistic effects across all features. SHAP importance ≠ variance explained.
feature_importance_analysis.seasonal_insights: Holiday and weather features have lower individual importance but enhance model robustness for special events and weather-driven demand patterns.
